```{=html}
<script>
// Convert DOI spans to clickable links
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const doiSpans = document.querySelectorAll('.listing-doi');
  
  doiSpans.forEach(function(span) {
    const doiUrl = span.textContent.trim();
    if (doiUrl && (doiUrl.includes('doi.org') || doiUrl.includes('doi:'))) {
      // Create a link element
      const link = document.createElement('a');
      link.href = doiUrl;
      link.textContent = 'DOI';
      link.target = '_blank';
      link.rel = 'noopener noreferrer';
      
      // Replace the span content with the link
      span.innerHTML = '';
      span.appendChild(link);
    }
  });
});
</script>
```
